Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: corvettefan
Reviews.Content: previously ramada inn cleaned somewhat little paid moneys worth 2 queen bed appreciate sink counter outside toiletshower getting ready time accessed outside walkways free breakfast consisting sausage patties bisquits gravy toast donuts prepared egg patties fruit dry cereal etc front desk extremely friendly helpful motel located quiet busy hwy 76
